NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
o?nct -'f
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
May 23, 1958
Dr. John C. Schwarzwalder
The Charles Miller Hospital
125 College Avenue West
St. Paul, Minnesota
Dear Johns
Upon returning to the office today after
several days' absence, I was sorry to learn that
you were confined to the hospital.
If there is anything I can do, be sure to
call on me.
Take good care of yourself! Best wishes for
a pleasant convalescence.
Yours sincerely,
Burton Paulu
President
BP:ds
